title: Coma
lyrics:
One of three B-Sides to Cave, the others being Twin and Host.  It is one of Muse’s oldest songs, dating back to 1996.  It is also quite poppy, but it’s very catchy.
[Verse 1]
Confide in me
Sustain all my apathy
You're such a mess
You can learn not to confess
[Chorus 1]
You will not find it in me
Simply because I can't
Wake up and find it in me
I'm in a coma
You will not find it in me
And you'll reveal all your pains again
[Verse 2]
We'll fall asleep
So deeply out of reach
For years feeling dead
We can fall right out of bed
[Chorus 1]
You will not find it in me
Simply because I can't
Wake up and find it in me
I'm in a coma
You will not find it in me
And you'll reveal all your pains again

[Chorus 2]
Hey
, such a mess and I don't care
Simply because I can't
Wake up and find it in me
I'm in a coma
You will not find it in me
And you'll reveal all your pains again
